summary: The TypeScript SDK loader hangs when cyclic module dependencies are detected. The issue requests detection and proper error throwing instead of hanging.
userImpact: Users experience application hangs when their code has circular module dependencies, making the SDK unusable.
rootCause: The module loader does not detect cyclic dependencies and enters an infinite loop
proposedFix: Detect cyclic module dependencies and throw an error instead of hanging
resolutionDetails: The loader now detects and throws on cyclic module dependencies
keyQuote: the loader will hang when a cycle is found
